title: Frontline Defense
description: Frontline Defense is a tower defense game where you must strategically position towers along the enemy's path to defend your territory. As with other tower defense games, your objective is to build and strategically position towers to annihilate waves of incoming enemies. By employing effective tower placement and utilizing unique abilities you can successfully defend your territory and emerge victorious. Prepare for an exciting challenge as you navigate through various levels and devise strategies to defeat your adversaries!
